original_text: And whenever a man came near to pay homage to him, he would put out his hand and take hold of him and kiss him.
korean_text: 사람이 가까이 와서 그에게 절하려 하면 압살롬이 손을 펴서 그 사람을 붙들고 그에게 입을 맞추니

sentences.original_text: And whenever a man came near to pay homage to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 사람이 그에게 경배하러 가까이 오면

sentences.original_text: he would put out his hand
